title: Eligibility
conditions: Must be a currently enrolled UCI student.
Must have a minimum GPA of 2.0.

title: Conference Conduct
conditions: Participants must dress in business attire during the conference. If participant’s attire does not meet standards, they will be asked to leave and come back with proper clothing.
Cell phones are to be kept away during the debate sessions.
Any form of harassment or discrimination will not be tolerated. Any participant found guilty of this will be immediately expelled from the conference.

title: Liability
conditions: All participants are responsible for any damages to the venue/facility that they may cause during the conference.
UCI Engineering Conference is not liable for any injuries or accidents
UCI Engineering Conference is not liable for any theft during the span of the conference.

title: Privacy
conditions: There will be photography and videography during the duration of the conference.
Basic Information in registration process will be used for statistical reasons.

title: Smoking, Alcohol, and Drug Policy
conditions: Participants are expected to follow UCI’s policy of non-smoking policy.
Open containers of alcohol are prohibited on UCI and conference venue grounds.
UCI Engineering Conference prohibits the unlawful possession of drugs/controlled substances on conference grounds.

title: Expulsion from Conference
conditions: If found violating Terms and Conditions, participants are subject to expulsion from the conference.

title: Plagiarism
conditions: Work that is not the participant’s own (i.e. paraphrased work, uncited documents, verbatim) will put them in danger of expulsion.

title: Intellectual Property
conditions: UCI Engineering Conference claims copyright to all information on engineeringconferenceuci.com, which is not limited to, logo design, mission statement, vision statement, documents designs, etc.
All ideas and designs developed by participants during the conference may be claimed for personal use outside of the conference.
